definition: to ride (in a car or carriage)/to drive/to motor
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: On October 12 two sick children arrived at the hospital in a vehicle from a nomad encampment.
sentences.chinese: 在10月12日有兩名患病兒童從牧區乘車來到醫院。

sentences.english: Rosa Parks, was arrested for not giving a white bus rider her seat, Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 帕克斯夫人是由於未給一名白人乘車者讓座而被捕。

sentences.english: Morning, drive to Lijiang, the cultural center of the Naxi Minority.
sentences.chinese: 早上，乘車至麗江，這裏是納西族的文化中心。

sentences.english: In the most serious frame of mind Pierre drove up to the old prince's house.
sentences.chinese: 皮埃爾懷着極其嚴肅的心情乘車去老公爵家。

sentences.english: Why must I have my nose in the armpit of my fellow subway rider?
sentences.chinese: 地鐵裏，爲什麼我的鼻子要貼到其他乘車人的腋窩處？

sentences.english: Chrysanthemum and all those heading for Shijiazhuang will borad the train at 6pm the same day.
sentences.chinese: 菊鳳將於七日上午六時乘車出發去石家莊。

sentences.english: Baotou by car from the northbound carriageway, the Guyang County on the Prairie into the Bayan Obo.
sentences.chinese: 由包頭乘車北行，過固陽縣就進入白雲鄂博大草原了。

sentences.english: Do you have the habit that giving place to elder or kid forwardly when you got on?
sentences.chinese: 乘車時你有主動給老人和小孩讓座的習慣嗎？

sentences.english: You associate each part of what you have to remember with a landmark in a route you know well, like your commute to work.
sentences.chinese: 把你熟記的路線都聯繫起來，你比如乘車上班。

sentences.english: Summer magnum sister rides to jo jo about good place.
sentences.chinese: 夏夢龍兄妹乘車向喬喬約好的地點趕去。

sentences.english: Many tourists come to Haina constould likelyy year.
sentences.chinese: 兩年前他們乘車去鄉下游覽。

sentences.english: The next day, we drove inland.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，我們乘車開往內陸。

sentences.english: After visiting Chenghuangmiao, we went to Pudong District to visit Dongfang Pearl Towel.
sentences.chinese: 逛完城隍廟後，我們乘車去浦東參觀東方明珠。

sentences.english: A: Can I cancel this ticket?
Despite bad weather and other risks, flying remains the safer than driving.
sentences.chinese: 除去惡劣天氣等威脅，乘飛機還是要比乘車安全。

sentences.english: Can I transfer by this ticket?

definition: to get on or into (a bus, train, car etc)
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
to get off or out of (a bus, train, car etc)
to cross a barrier/to get through (an ordeal)/to pass (a test)/to reach (a standard)
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
bus/abbr. for 公共汽車|公共汽车[gong1 gong4 qi4 che1]/car belonging to an organization and used by its members (government car, police car, company car etc)/abbr. for 公務用車|公务用车[gong1 wu4 yong4 che1]
